snippet.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Race across land, sea, air, space, and time in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds! Warp through Travel Rings into new dimensions where something new awaits around every twist and turn. Speed to victory solo or as a team in a variety of offline and online modes and compete against players from around the world. Build the ultimate machine to match your racing style, unlock gadgets to gain the upper hand, and unleash power-up items for the win!

Find out more: https://www.sega.com/sonic-the-hedgehog/sonic-racing-crossworlds

Wishlist now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005570/

Sign up before February 19th for a chance to join the PS5 Closed Network Test: https://bit.ly/CrossWorldsClosedNetworkTest

Fans from Asia, please use the following sign-up link: https://asia.sega.com/SonicRacingCrossWorlds/en/ClosedNetworkTest/

Check out our other social pages to stay up to date on the latest Sonic happenings: 

https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog 
https://facebook.com/sonic 
https://instagram.com/sonicthehedgehog 
https://tiktok.com/@sonic_hedgehog
